original_text: the only excitement comes when the credits finally roll and you get to leave the theater .
generated_text:
1. "The only thing that kept me awake was the ticking clock on my watch, waiting for the credits to roll."
2. "I was relieved when the movie finally ended, and I could escape the boredom."
3. "The most thrilling part was the moment the credits started rolling, signaling the end of the torture."
4. "I was eager to leave the theater and put this snooze-fest behind me."
